column1: # Title: State-Specific Multiple Load Segments Subsector Shareweight Assumptions
# Comments: Subsector shareweights for subsectors that are not fixed at calibration values.
# These subsectors need a "to-value" which specifies the value to which the shareweight is being interpolated.
# This table adjusts shareweights / interpolation functions for particular states.
# Hawaii is is not allowed to deploy natural gas electric power plants in future model periods. According to the EIA
column2: Hawaii has no natural gas consumption and no electricity generation by gas. Considering that over half of final energy consumption is for transport
column3: and that there are no energy intensive industries and limited heating needs
column4: building expensive LNG terminals or storage facilities seems unrealistic. Thus
column5: we do not allow gas-fired electricity as an option for Hawaii.
